DOC.brief_summary: This study is a multicenter, non-randomized, retrospective study to collect long term (4 years post-transplant) clinical outcome data on subjects previously enrolled in the CTOT-05 study (NCT00466804) to evaluate participant and graft survival.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Multicenter Study to Determine 4-Year Clinical Outcomes in Subjects Previously Enrolled in the CTOT-05 Study
DOC.criteria: 1. Subjects previously enrolled in the CTOT05 study 2. Subjects 4 years posttransplant (+/ 6 months). 1. Withdrawal of consent from the CTOT05 study.
